name: SpaceAttack! - For Houdini GameJam 2020
description:
HOW TO PLAY : 

AWSD to move around

LEFT MOUSE CLICK to DASH

E to activate Turrets / rocket


Game made for the SideFX Houdini Game Jam of august 2020 !

Goal of the game is to collect enough scraps from fallen meteors, in order to escape through the rocket ! But be careful ! some robots sometimes spawns from the meteors...

Difficulty increases over time, more robots, radios of meteors will increase as well as their frequency.

You can buy turrets for a limited duration with your scraps, lowering difficulty and giving you more time to collect scraps.
